action.title: üî• Action-Packed Thrills
action.description: Get into the heart of the action with these exciting games!

adventure.title: üó∫Ô∏è Epic Adventures
adventure.description: Embark on epic journeys and explore new worlds.

racing.title: üèéÔ∏è High-Speed Racing
racing.description: Put the pedal to the metal and race to victory!

puzzle.title: üß† Brain-Teasing Puzzles
puzzle.description: Challenge your mind and solve these clever puzzles.

pacman.title: Pacman
pacman.description: A timeless arcade classic where you navigate a maze, eat all the dots, and evade the colorful ghosts!
pacman.instructions: Use the arrow keys to move Pac-Man. Clear the maze by eating all the small dots. Eating a large Power Pellet allows you to temporarily eat the ghosts for bonus points.

tetris.title: Tetris
tetris.description: The iconic puzzle game of falling blocks. Strategically arrange them to create and clear solid horizontal lines.
tetris.instructions: Use the arrow keys to move and rotate the falling blocks (Tetriminos). Complete horizontal lines to score points and make space for more blocks. The game ends if the blocks stack up to the top.

snake.title: Snake
snake.description: The classic game of growth and survival. Guide your snake to eat food and grow longer, but don't run into walls or yourself!
snake.instructions: Use the arrow keys to change the snake's direction. Eat the food that appears on the screen to grow. The game ends if the snake collides with the edges of the screen or its own body.

defender.title: Defender
defender.description: A classic side-scrolling shooter. Pilot your ship to defend astronauts from waves of alien invaders.
defender.instructions: Control your ship and shoot at the alien enemies. Protect the astronauts on the ground. The game requires fast reflexes and strategic positioning.

bounce.title: Bounce
bounce.description: A beloved classic from old mobile phones. Guide the red ball through various levels, navigating obstacles and collecting rings.
bounce.instructions: Use the arrow keys to move the ball left and right, and the up arrow to jump. Navigate through the level's platforms and hazards to reach the exit.

puzzle.title: Puzzle
puzzle.description: A relaxing jigsaw puzzle game. Piece together beautiful images and challenge your visual perception.
puzzle.instructions: Drag and drop the puzzle pieces onto the board to assemble the image. Start with the edges and work your way in. There's no time limit, so you can enjoy it at your own pace.

spider.title: Spider Solitaire
spider.description: A challenging and popular variant of Solitaire. The goal is to build stacks of cards of the same suit, from King down to Ace.
spider.instructions: Drag cards to create descending sequences (King, Queen, Jack, etc.). You can move any sequence of the same suit. Complete a full suit from K to A to remove it from the board. Clear all cards to win.

traffic-rider.title: Traffic Rider
traffic-rider.description: A fast-paced, first-person motorcycle racing game. Weave through highway traffic, overtake cars, and upgrade your bike.
traffic-rider.instructions: Control your motorcycle to dodge cars and trucks on a busy highway. The closer your overtakes, the more points you score. Earn cash to buy and upgrade new bikes.

racing-limits.title: Racing Limits
racing-limits.description: An arcade racing game that pushes the boundaries of mobile racing with its various exciting game modes.
racing-limits.instructions: Choose from modes like Carrier, Infinite, and Free Ride. Drive your car through traffic, earning points for speed and near misses. Use your earnings to customize and upgrade your vehicle.

idle-saga.title: Idle Saga
idle-saga.description: An incremental RPG where you build a team of heroes who fight for you automatically. Manage upgrades and strategy to progress.
idle-saga.instructions: Your heroes fight and earn gold automatically. Use the gold to upgrade your characters and unlock new abilities. Your main role is strategic management to maximize your team's power, even when you're away.

monster-survivors.title: Monster Survivors
monster-survivors.description: A survival game with rogue-lite elements. Face relentless waves of monsters, choose upgrades, and survive as long as you can.
monster-survivors.instructions: Your character attacks automatically. Your job is to move around to evade hordes of monsters. When you level up, choose from a selection of new weapons and passive upgrades to create powerful synergies.

one-falls-all-fall.title: One Falls, All Fall
one-falls-all-fall.description: A challenging game of coordination and survival. Control two characters simultaneously across different lanes, and if one fails, the game is over.
one-falls-all-fall.instructions: Tap the screen to make the characters jump over obstacles in their respective lanes. You must pay attention to both characters at once. The game tests your multitasking skills as any single mistake ends the run.

18296.title: ZigZag Snow Mountain
18296.description: Just Freeskiing is a highly authentic ski/freeski simulation with sheer endless possibilities to tweak, style and combine realistic tricks!

4865.title: Hero Rescue Puzzle
4865.description: Do you like rescue games? Of course, they are great. Help the hero rescue to save the princess and get the treasure in the new hero wars game - Hero Rescue.

7451.title: Love Balls 2D
7451.description: It's time to use your brain and find a way to bump the balls! The rule's easy, just draw lines or shapes to bump the balls, you will need your wisdom and imagination.

20593.title: Happy Glass : Fill the Glass by Draw Lines
20593.description: Simply Filling Happy Glass with Draw Lines, Make a Crow Happy Try to find the best way to complete each level.
20593.instructions: - Draw Lines with Mouse Left Click

13555.title: Pou Online
13555.description: Do you have what it takes to take care of your very own alien pet? Feed and take care of Pou.

7296.title: Zombie Bears Night Shooting
7296.description: Zombies walk among us! You are one of the few survivors of a pandemic infection.

10144.title: Roof Rails - Color Stack 3D
10144.description: Welcome to play roof rails 3d games of 2021 with fat pusher giant shortcut rush run 3d.

6152.title: Among Us Online Edition
6152.description: Welcome to game Among Us Online Edition - game based on Among Us, but in this game you can play only solo and as imposter on the space ship.

2178.title: Minecraft Remake
2178.description: Classic minecraft game! Explore infinite worlds and build everything from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles.

2461.title: Baldi's Basics v1.4.3
2461.description: Baldi's Basics v1.4.3 - Inspired by creepy/bad edutainment games from the 90s.

16062.title: Talking Tom Gold Run Online
16062.description: Talking Tom Gold Run Online is the best cat running game. Enjoy hours of fun with your loved cat, run to collect gold coins after being robbed in this endless runner game!
